front.title: Analysis of Inter-domain Label Switched Path (LSP) Recovery

abstract.t: This document analyzes various schemes to realize Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) and Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) Label Switched Path (LSP) recovery in multi-domain networks based on the existing framework for multi-domain LSPs. The main focus for this document is on establishing end-to-end diverse Traffic Engineering (TE) LSPs in multi-domain networks. It presents various diverse LSP setup schemes based on existing functional elements.
